============
Installation
============

At the command line::

    pip install pip-madison

Or, if you have virtualenvwrapper installed:

.. code-block:: bash

    mkvirtualenv pipmadison
    pip install pip-madison

Or you can install from source

.. code-block:: bash

    git clone https://github.com/joranbeasley/pip-madison.git
    cd pip-madison
    python setup.py install
